member.name: P:PixelLab.Wpf.Reveal.IsExpanded
member.summary: Whether the child is expanded or not. Note that an animation may be in progress when the value changes. This is not meant to be used with AnimationProgress and can overwrite any animation or values in that property.

member.name: P:PixelLab.Wpf.Reveal.Duration
member.summary: The duration in milliseconds of the reveal animation. Will apply to the next animation that occurs (not to currently running animations).

member.name: P:PixelLab.Wpf.Reveal.AnimationProgress
member.summary: Value between 0 and 1 (inclusive) to move the reveal along. This is not meant to be used with IsExpanded.

member.name: F:PixelLab.Wpf.HorizontalRevealMode.None
member.summary: No horizontal reveal animation.

member.name: F:PixelLab.Wpf.HorizontalRevealMode.FromLeftToRight
member.summary: Reveal from the left to the right.

member.name: F:PixelLab.Wpf.HorizontalRevealMode.FromRightToLeft
member.summary: Reveal from the right to the left.

member.name: F:PixelLab.Wpf.HorizontalRevealMode.FromCenterToEdge
member.summary: Reveal from the center to the bounding edge.
